about_the_game:
Hello Yuna is a serene exploration game set in the heart of a beautifully crafted Japanese city. In this atmospheric journey, you play as Yuna, a curious young woman discovering the vibrant streets, hidden alleys, and tranquil parks of a bustling urban landscape. With no combat or complex mechanics, the focus of Hello Yuna is purely on exploration and immersion.

Stroll through detailed districts, from busy marketplaces filled with colorful vendors to peaceful shrines nestled between skyscrapers. Uncover the stories of the city by interacting with its inhabitants, each with their own unique backgrounds and perspectives. Collect memories through photography, visit quaint cafes, and participate in traditional festivals as the seasons change around you.

Perfect for those who enjoy slice-of-life experiences, Hello Yuna invites you to slow down, breathe, and enjoy the beauty of everyday life.
